name: Space Shooter 2D (hoshicameron)
description: One of the games that I was very interested in when I was a child, and they bring back fond memories of that time, are 2D space shooters. Well, I decided to recreate a similar version of them. I hope that if you have the same experience as me, those sweet memories will remind you too. Thank you very much for playing the game I made. Your comments about the game will be very encouraging. Wishing you the best.
